text: I had a great experience with Jayne, She is not only knowledgeable but also very friendly. Her advice is clear and easy to understand, and she goes the extra mile to be helpful. I highly recommend her to anyone in need of legal advice!

Jayne Wong, Notary Public, was incredibly detailed and professional. She thoroughly explained the entire process, leaving no stones unturned, which gave me great confidence in her expertise. She witnessed my signature and ensured that the document was swiftly sent to the Singapore Academy of Law for apostille. Jayne handled everything from start to finish with impressive efficiency. Highly recommend her services!

Lawyer Jayne represent my ex wife in our divorce case, I'm very impressed that she has drafted the defence and counter claim for my ex wife so well so that I find it so difficult to contest it. A very good divorce lawyer whom I highly recommend if you need one.

I visited to get a document notarized. Jayne was super helpful and accommodated me on the same day with an appointment. In addition to being knowledgeable and efficient in helping me notarize my document, Jayne was also incredibly friendly and professional. It's really helpful having this service available in the Beauty World area.

Not all legal firms advertise their services so we rely on websites and reviews. I went through the same process and found Jayne Wong and tried my luck. I have to say that I am lucky to have found her!
I did my legal matters with her and not only was she able to advise in her professional capacity, she went the extra mile by ensuring that my matters were right and documentations were in order.
She's candid, jovial, homely and honest to a fault. And that is saying something about a lawyer.
She might decline to dwell into matters not within her expertise, as any decent lawyer is not supposed to, but when she is in her house, she brings in her years of experience into play and gives her professional  best with a generous touch of humility to solve your legal matters. Like mine.
So thank you Jayne for your help. God bless you.
